Annotation Types Summary
ApplicationScoped  
Cacheable On types, this annotation means that the type will be cached.
Component  
PrototypeScoped Components annotated as prototypeScoped will be created whenever asked for an instance.
RequestScoped  
SessionScoped  
Stereotype Annotations which are intended to mark VRaptor components should be annotated with this.
